sentences.sContent: measure until farmers get their act together and facilitate the growth of native pollinator
sentences.sContent_eng: measure until farmers get their act together and facilitate the growth of native pollinator
sentences.sCn: 他们还需要认识到，它们的角色很大程度上是临时的，作为一项权宜直到农民能共同行动起来，促进自然授粉者数量的增长。

sentences.sContent: It is nectarivorous, which means it feeds mostly on nectar and is an important pollinator in its tropical deciduous forest habitat.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is nectarivorous, which means it feeds mostly on nectar and is an important pollinator in its tropical deciduous forest habitat.
sentences.sCn: 它是食蜜动物，就是说，它主要的食物是花蜜，在其热带落叶林栖息地里，是重要的花粉传播者。

trans.tranOther: A pollinator is something that pollinates plants, especially a type of insect
